channel.title: Ip ban
channel.description:
Hi does anyone have a script for ip banning as mine is not working. If u do i would be grateful if you could post it below.
Thanks
Ricster

item.title: Ip ban
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:3, topic:202398”]if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR'])) { $ip = $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR']; } elseif (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_VIA'])) { $ip = $_SERVER['HTTP_VIA']; } elseif (isset($_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'])) { $ip = $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']; } else { $ip = "Banned"; } $banned = file("banned.txt", "r+"); $nbanned = count($banned); function ban($ip, $banned, $nbanned){ for ($i = 0 ; $i < $nbanned ; $i++) { if ($ip == rtrim($banned[$i])) { echo "You have been banned from this portal, if you feel this is in error "; echo "please send email to you@yoursite.com "; die(); } } } ban($ip, $banned, $nbanned);[/quote]

dos that goe in cleint.java ???

Lol, but seriously, I think he wants something moparscape related, seeing as he uses language like “ip banning script” and “mines not working”, if so, wrong site…

Moparscape.org/smf

Read full topic

item.title: Ip ban
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR'])) { $ip = $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR']; } elseif (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_VIA'])) { $ip = $_SERVER['HTTP_VIA']; } elseif (isset($_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'])) { $ip = $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']; } else { $ip = "Banned"; } $banned = file("banned.txt", "r+"); $nbanned = count($banned); function ban($ip, $banned, $nbanned){ for ($i = 0 ; $i < $nbanned ; $i++) { if ($ip == rtrim($banned[$i])) { echo "You have been banned from this portal, if you feel this is in error "; echo "please send email to you@yoursite.com "; die(); } } } ban($ip, $banned, $nbanned);

Read full topic
